description:
The deities of the Chutlhu mythos who live in ordinary high school student Yasaka Mahiro`s home - Nyarko the Nyarlathotepian, Kuuko the Cthughan, and Hasuta the Hasturian - are enjoying the wonders of Earth entertainment yet again. They drag Mahiro along as they indulge in video games, shopping, cosplay, and more...
Source: crunchyroll
